医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
细菌通讯系统有助于抵抗抗生素的生存当遇到抗生素、有毒物质或其他相当大的压力源时，细菌能够利用细胞间通讯激活防御机制来“警告”未受影响的细菌，然后细菌可以预测、保护自己并传播警告信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Bacterial-communication-system-aids-survival-against-antibiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Bacterial-communication-system-aids-survival-against-antibiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a27bc3d-9caf-4b2d-b525-d70a9000ad9c Wed, 10 Jul 2024 13:50:44 -0400 Bacterial communication system aids survival against antibiotics
突破性的蛋白质图谱揭示了疾病研究的细胞见解剑桥大学的科学家开发了蛋白质图谱，描述了它们在人类细胞内的行为方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Groundwriting- Protein-atlas-reveals-cellular-insights-for-disease-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Groundwriting- Protein-atlas-reveals-cellular-insights-for-disease-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22a1c062-91a1-43b9-a5d8-684883f29a94 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 13:39:48 -0400 Groundbreaking protein atlas reveals cellular insights for disease research
血癌药物有助于提高脑膜瘤放射治疗的效率一项新的研究发现，开发用于对抗血液和其他癌症的药物也有助于提高成人最常诊断的低级别脑肿瘤的放射治疗效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Blood-cancer-drug-could-help-improve-the-efficiency-of-radiotherapy-in-meningiomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Blood-cancer-drug-could-help-improve-the-efficiency-of-radiotherapy-in-meningiomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=340f2558-5ebf-472d-8f5f-2d80392be871 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 13:27:42 -0400 Blood cancer drug could help improve the efficiency of radiotherapy in meningiomas
高强度间歇运动可改善老年人的大脑功能昆士兰大学研究人员的一项纵向研究发现，高强度间歇运动可以改善老年人的大脑功能长达 5 年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/High-intensity-interval-exercise-improves-brain-function-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/High-intensity-interval-exercise-improves-brain-function-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c95cb07-bf74-423c-bc61-d0e39740420e Wed, 10 Jul 2024 13:20:00 -0400 High-intensity interval exercise improves brain function in older adults
OraQuick HCV 自检获得 WHO 资格预审世界卫生组织 (WHO) 已对首个丙型肝炎病毒 (HCV) 自检进行了资格预审，这可以为扩大检测和诊断范围、加速全球消除丙型肝炎的努力提供关键支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/OraQuick-HCV-self-test-receives-WHO-prequalification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/OraQuick-HCV-self-test-receives-WHO-prequalification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef396435-2b7f-4b67-9156-585646f191bd Wed, 10 Jul 2024 10:26:40 -0400 OraQuick HCV self-test receives WHO prequalification
冷冻电镜揭示转录起始过程中 RNAP-DNA 相互作用的结构动力学每个活细胞都会将 DNA 转录成 RNA。当一种叫做 RNA 聚合酶 (RNAP) 的酶夹住 DNA 时，这个过程就开始了。在几百毫秒内，DNA 双螺旋解开形成一个称为转录泡的节点，这样一条暴露的 DNA 链就可以复制成一条互补的 RNA 链。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Cryo-EM-reveals-structural-dynamics-of-RNAP-DNA-interactions-during-transcription-initiation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Cryo-EM-reveals-structural-dynamics-of-RNAP-DNA-interactions-during-transcription-initiation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7385d68c-45da-4b05-be87-f80715597038 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 08:34:17 -0400 Cryo-EM reveals structural dynamics of RNAP-DNA interactions during transcription initiation
点击式化学可快速开发 LNP 以增强 mRNA 递送想象一下这样一个场景：熟练的黑客必须上传关键软件来更新中央服务器，并阻止潜在致命的病毒在庞大的计算机网络中造成严重破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Click-like-chemistry-enables-rapid-development-of-LNPs-for-enhanced-mRNA-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Click-like-chemistry-enables-rapid-development-of-LNPs-for-enhanced-mRNA-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57eeefb1-3421-439c-bdd1-6102e2dfdcb1 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 08:02:57 -0400 Click-like chemistry enables rapid development of LNPs for enhanced mRNA delivery
安东尼·德·福格罗勒 (Antonin (Tony) de Fougerolles) 被任命为以太坊新任主席领先的 mRNA 技术公司 etherna 今天宣布任命 Antonin (Tony) de Fougerolles 为董事长。 Tony 自 2023 年 1 月起担任独立董事会成员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Antonin-(Tony)-de-Fougerolles-appointed-as-new-Chair-of-etherna.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Antonin-(Tony)-de-Fougerolles-appointed-as-new-Chair-of-etherna.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97ba9af4-90bf-45c7-9265-25cf2c99e6c7 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 07:59:00 -0400 Antonin (Tony) de Fougerolles appointed as new Chair of etherna
利用逆转录子衍生的多变子进行高效的多位点基因组编辑基因组编辑已成为一种广泛采用的修改细胞 DNA 的技术，使科学家能够在实验室中研究疾病并开发修复致病突变的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Efficient-multi-site-genome-editing-with-retron-衍生-multitrons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Efficient-multi-site-genome-editing-with-retron-衍生-multitrons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41b192d4-9672-46d9-9f98-4d7ef2893c31 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 07:45:04 -0400 Efficient multi-site genome editing with retron-derived multitrons
探索小型化 NGS 文库制备的好处在本次采访中，SPT Labtech 的现场应用科学家 Huw Rees 讨论了 NGS 文库制备中小型化的好处，以及使用蚊子®如何为您带来更多价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Exploring-the-benefits-of-miniaturizing-NGS-library-preparation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Exploring-the-benefits-of-miniaturizing-NGS-library-preparation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75048af5-bb94-472e-bb72-ae83cce02a6c Wed, 10 Jul 2024 07:45:00 -0400 Exploring the benefits of miniaturizing NGS library preparation
